column4: some1 teach me how to install a printer on ubuntu server. i want this printer to be accessed by clients.. psl
it i type the command lpadmin -E -p EpsonLX300 -v usb://EPSON/LX-300+ -P /usr/share/ppd/cups-included/Epson/epson.ppd -u allow:all it says "lpadmin: Unauthorized"????
it says " root@sysadmin-ubuntuServer:~# apt lpadmin -E -p EpsonLX300 -v usb://EPSON/LX-300+ -P /usr/share/ppd/cups-included/Epson/epson.ppd -u allow:all
why are you logged in as root?
do you normally log in as root?
it says i have to download some packages?
do you log in as root normally?
not really.. i dont log as root normally
you need  to sudo apt-get install sun-java6-jdk
by enabling root you have reduced the security of your system
try closing the page and restart cupsd
i tried a million times.. but its always like that.. :(
btw im downloading sun package atm
then id go for the conf file, backup the current one so you can rollback if needed
most of the HOWTOS availabe in configuring cupsd.conf are outdated.
